title: Bug 113047: No children node listing when changing data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab
OB: When changing the data source for a data set in the data set editor page of the query tab, the children node is not listed.
EB: The expected result is that when changing the data source, the children related to the new data source should be listed.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Open the query tab in the data set editor page.
2. Locate a data set that has children nodes.
3. Change the data source for the data set.
4. Observe that the children nodes are not listed.
